title: Onee Chanbara ORIGIN: Deluxe Edition – v1.04 + 96 DLCs
body:
Onee Chanbara ORIGIN: Deluxe Edition – v1.04 + 96 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Action, Third-person, 3D, Japanese, Zombies
Companies: Tamsoft, D3Publisher
Languages: ENG/MULTI5
Original Size: 11.4 GB
Repack Size: from 2 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: ZippyShare
  • Filehoster: BayFiles
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Onee.Chanbara.ORIGIN.Deluxe.Edition.v1.04.HAPPY.XMAS-DARKSiDERS ISO release: ds-oneechanbaraorigindeluxeeditionv104happyxmas.iso (12,226,220,032 bytes)
  • Game version is v1.04/BuildID 6475919 from April 7, 2021
  • All 96 DLCs are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of credits videos and optional Japanese/Korean/Chinese localizations
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 11.4 to 2~4.3 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 3-10 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 22 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

To commemorate the 15th anniversary of the sword fighting action game series Onee Chanbara, the events of THE Onee Chanbara and THE Onee Chanbara 2 have been completely remade in full HD!

The story of Aya and Saki, two sisters bound by mutual hatred and locked in a brutal fight to the death, has been revived and Leimagined.

Main character designer Katsumi Enami breathes new life into the characters, making this silky-smooth 60fps high-speed action game an unmissable treat.

All shall be revealed in this recreated re-release of the games that started it all in Onee Chanbara OrThe Story

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS EXTREMELY backwards compatible with my previous OCO repack. The only changed files are setup.exe and fg-04.bin, so you need to download only 9 MB of new data.
